external_games.name: TIME FOR YOU - CHAPTER 02 - DIRTY THOUGHTS AND CORPORATE BOTS

name: Time for You: Chapter 02 - Dirty Thoughts and Corporate Bots
summary: The continuation of Time For You! There's something strange going on at ETMI Corp. Selena has been gone for too long and her coworkers are anything but normal. Find Selena, figure out what's going on, and get home. Should be easy, right?
